description: This file is the main frontend source code for a Flutter-based Tic Tac Toe game. It includes the app's theming, main widgets, game logic, state management, UI components, score persistence via shared preferences, and AI move logic for single-player mode.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: The root widget that sets up the MaterialApp with theming and initial home screen.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main stateful widget managing game mode, scores, and containing the game board and controls.

classes.name: _HeaderSection
classes.description: Widget for game mode toggle buttons.

classes.name: ScoreSection
classes.description: Widget displaying the current scores for X, O, and draws.

classes.name: TicTacToeBoard
classes.description: Stateful widget implementing the game grid, handling user moves, AI moves, game logic, and end-of-game dialogs.

classes.name: _TicTacToeCell
classes.description: Represents a single cell in the Tic Tac Toe grid, displaying X/O or empty state.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: _loadScores
methods.description: Loads saved scores from shared preferences.

methods.name: _updateScores
methods.description: Saves current scores to shared preferences.

methods.name: _onGameResult
methods.description: Handles game result, updating scores and informing parent widget.

methods.name: _resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board for a new game.

methods.name: _showSnack
methods.description: Displays a snack bar with a message.

methods.name: _startNewGame
methods.description: Initializes a new game state in TicTacToeBoard.

methods.name: _handleTap
methods.description: Handles user tap on a cell, manages move logic including AI moves.

methods.name: _findBasicAIMove
methods.description: Simple AI logic to choose the next move.

methods.name: _checkWinner
methods.description: Determines the winner of the current board state.

methods.name: _showEndDialog
methods.description: Displays dialog at game end showing the result.

methods.name: _isWinnerCell
methods.description: Highlights cells that are part of the winning line.

methods.name: _buildSymbolWidget
methods.description: Builds visual Icon widget for X or O.
